fr.upmc.alasca.computer.components

Class Computer

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.upmc.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.upmc.alasca.computer.components.Computer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComputerProviderI, ComponentI, ComponentImplementedI, OfferedI, java.rmi.Remote

    public class Computer
extends AbstractComponent
implements ComputerProviderI
    La classe Computer definit la machine qui gere la creation et la destruction des machines virtuelles VirtualMachine.

    Created on : 10 oct. 2014

    Version:
    $Name$ -- $Revision$ -- $Date$
    Author:
    Nicolas Mounier Henri NG
